tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Jasneet Singh was outstanding. They took the time to explain the procedures for braces and answered all of my questions with patience and clarity. I appreciated the dentist's attention to detail and commitment to my comfort throughout the visit.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr Jasneet & Dr Simran took care of my dental issues exceptionally well. It was my first time to visit them and I walked in to the clinic  with enormous pain, they immediately attended to the issue and explained the treatment that they would be performing. They have great staff Ms Priyanka & Ms Jigyasa who would attend to the queries in a remarkable way, I was super impressed when they got in touch with me on Sunday to schedule my appointment. You would feel very welcomed at their clinic  and would be looked after very well. I’m glad I landed at the right clinic and I highly recommend them.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I left the dental clinic feeling incredibly grateful for Dr. Jasneet's expertise and gentle approach throughout the ceramic braces treatment. Their attention to detail and reassurance made the experience surprisingly pleasant, and I'm thrilled with the results.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Very honest Dr. Jasneet. Will tell you your diagnosis as it is without trying to sell you anything. Even if you don't opt to go with him, he will make sure you have your concepts cleared. I had a consultation with toothsi, in which their doctors created panic to go for their treatments. After coming to dental works, I got to know my teeth are functionally totally fine and there's no need to panic.
**** ************* *** trustworthy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I recently visited  Dr. Simran at Dental Works Clinic for the pain I was experiencing in my lower left teeth. From the moment I walked in, I was impressed by the professionalism and warmth of the entire staff.

Dr. Simran's expertise and knowledge were evident right from the initial consultation. She took the time to listen attentively to my concerns and thoroughly explained the treatment plan for my dental problem to subside the pain and performed the RCT of the teeth in painless way. Her friendly approach immediately put me at ease.

Additionally, the follow-up care and guidance provided post-treatment were exceptional.

I highly recommend Dr. Simran to anyone seeking top-notch dental care. The level of professionalism, expertise, and genuine concern for patients' well-being make this clinic a standout choice for dental needs.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been referred to Dental works for treatment of my daughter aged nearly 3 years because of decayed teeth which needed immediate attention. Dr. Simran and her staff is very courteous and polite. She made sure that everything is explained during the procedure and my daughter feel comfortable throughout the process. *** **** ****** ********* **** *** **** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Dental Braces Fixing,Gap Closing,Dental Fillings,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,
review:
I had a life-changing experience at Dental works. I got my orthodontic treatment done with the most wonderful doctor who wants and suggests the best for his patients and i believe that no one could have done it better than him. I can't thank Dr Jasneet and Dr Simran enough for handling everything with so much precision and care, for answering my zillion questions and for providing me the best smile i could ever imagine. It is true that one can become more self-confident, more enthusiastic, more outgoing, more excited, and more passionate about life simply by changing their smiles which they made it possible for me. I do and always recommend only them who wants to be in safe hands and wants the best dental care :)
Even my grandfather's implant treatment which was a complicated one went on so smoothly and now he has the best teeth possible. So grateful!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Doctor Jasneet Singh is a great Doctor. He has done my daughter’s treatment . We are very satisfied and happy seeing the final results of my daughter’s jaw as if she has got a new jaw and it’s a bliss to see a big and broad smile on her face as she used to be very hesitant due to her uneven teeth before. He has been very humble and caring towards my daughter and our association with him for two long  years due to my daughter’s treatment has been great. I thank him for giving a  beautiful smile on my daughter’s face and making her even more confident. Thanks for being there.
Deepti Sehgal

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review:
I had a really weird set of teeth and wanted to get them done right. I visited many dentists but all of them suggested me to remove one or two teeth and some appliance for my jaw. Then I visited Dr. Jasneet, he did not prescribe removal of teeth or any appliance. He was very confident with how he was going to proceed.

Now, after my treatment, I feel that what he did was magic. The treatment was very comfortable throughout along with his constant support. ** ** ******** ** ** *********** *** *****

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Dr. Jasneet Singh -  One Stop Solution for all Dental Problems ✅  I have visited there few months ago for my ceramic braces. My braces have been on for 4 months and have seen great improvement to my teeth. He is having such a nice and amazing staff that make me super comfortable throughout the process. 😇

The best part is that Dr. Jasneet, took their time explaining everything thoroughly and answered each and every concern I had. 😇

All of i want to say that I am so grateful that I chose you and would “Highly Recommend” Dr. Jasneet Singh and his staff for all your orthodontic needs! ✨

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Wonderful experience. Words can’t be enough to express my feelings. I had an experience in Jeddah’s best dental hospital which was equipped with all the latest instruments facilities environment and Doctor having master degree from USA. It was good but the treatment guidence and environment at Dental works Delhi is far superior and excellent. 
Doctor Jasneet and Dr Simran are not only best professional but very friendly also. In our language both of them have dast e shafa (healing hands). I’m proud of them and the nation must be proud of such a skill. Pain free critical surgery of 60+ male salutes him.
May God bless you Doctor

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: *** ******* ** ** *** *** **** ******* ** *** ******* I started my treatment a year ago and it came to an end today. He was really brave to take me as his patient as I am nearing 50 years of age and I wanted to straighten out my teeth. Quite a tall order for Dr. Jasneet as my teeth and gums were not in the best of shape and health. He did a FANTASTIC job and I couldn't be happier! Today post my last appointment with him I can't stop smiling and feeling 20 years younger! Thank you Dr. Jasneet! ***********************
